div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h2: School will be closed until May 15.
Find information on the school closure, meals, child care for essential workers, student assignments and more on the COVID-19 Resources page.

img.alt: Dr. Rabey helps two teachers load food supplies into the back of a car.

div.p: Our Cayuga Heights faculty and staff miss the conversations, high fives and smiling faces of our students. See what they had to say in this video!
Our middle school teachers and staff have some heartwarming and fun messages for our students. We miss you and hope you are staying healthy and active!
Our Depew High School teachers miss our students and have created a video message for them during the COVID-19 closure. Stay safe and well and we hope to see all our students soon!
Check out the Depew COVID-19 Resources Page for news and important information. http://www.depewschools.org/o/district/page/depew-c ...
Read the April 8, 2020 COVID-19 Family Letter here: https://5il.co/evfh
